trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Medford
There were no other sightings in Medford on or around July 4th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside watching fireworks down the street from my home. it caught the corner of my eye. It started as one red light and it began to multiply. At one point there were 10 lights visible. At first I thought it could be a plane. It was not! The object or objects made no sound. One red light followed by another then a third one flickered on behind them and so on. As they passed over my head I got in the car to drive down to a golf course for a better view. I felt very scared and excited at the same time. I lost sight of them as they flickered out over the horizon. This is the third time I saw these red lights in the sky. The first time was July 3rd 2010 and july 4th 2010. I am an amateur astronomer and I have also been in the aerospace and defense industry for over 15 years. What I saw was not jet planes and it was not a planet or stars. These looked like the same lights that were filmed over Arizona a few years back.
